lesson.title_and_level: Intermediate - Uncomfortable Encounter in a Bar

sentence.idiomatic: When is your restaurant planning to open?
There's a shop over there that just opened. Let's go over and have a look.
Our shop opens for business today. We're doing a series of discount promotions, and we welcome everyone to come forward and try it.
He's just like his father. They're both tightwads, never treating anyone to a meal.
What day is today? Why would a tightwad like you insist on paying?
He may be really, rich, but he's actually tight-fisted. When we went to his home he didn't even treat us to some tea.
These years you've been abroad you missed out on quite a few good friends' weddings.
Because of the traffic jam I missed my flight.
Sorry, I'm late. Did I miss a lot of wonderful performances?
Enemies do have a way of running into each other. I was originally having a great time shopping, but then I saw someone I didn't want to see.
(Sigh
In this world, enemies really do have a way of running into each other. The more you hate seeing someone, the more likely you are to run into him. No matter what, you can't escape it.
Only through additional publicity will the product sell well.
The little shop just opened for business, so I hope everyone can help me spread the word as much as possible.
In order to make the new record a big hit, the company used many methods to publicize it.
He may seem very honest on the surface, but in fact he's a bad person.
He's always doing bad things behind people's backs. You're better off not associating with this kind of lowlife.
I never imagined he was a bad person. For his own gain he could betray a friend.
He was cheated out of a large sum of money by a friend. He now stays at home all day brooding.
What use is it for you to sit here brooding? If you have what it takes, then think of something to do about it.
When their son failed to get into university, he brooded for quite a few days in a row.
If you begged him like that and he still didn't agree to do it, just give up on it.
Although there was no word of her child for decades, she didn't lose hope, believing her child still lived.
To make him give up a little earlier, she purposely said she was already married.

word.literal: to have a change of heart
